TheSeer\phpDox\DocBlock\Factory::addParserFactory

Register a parser factory.

    Signature

    public function addParserFactory(string $annotation, FactoryInterface|string $factory )

    Parameters

    $annotation — string
    Identifier of the parser within the registry.
    $factory — object
    Instance of FactoryInterface to be registered or FQCN
    of the object to be created.

    Errors/Exceptions

    FactoryException
    in case $annotation is not a string.
